title: Summer Nights
description: SUMMER NIGHTS is the first flash fiction anthology compiled by The Great Noveling Adventure. The collected stories run the gamut from first love to heartbreak, revenge to forgiveness, redemption to murder. They, like the thirteen authors who contributed them, are widely varied, but they each demonstrate the same truth:A lot can happen in a single night.With stories from:Jenny Adams Perinovic Gabriella CrivilareCristina R. Guarino Antonius M. HogebrandtNeil Kettles Sarah Kettles Valerie LawsonAdriana Marachlian Kyrie McCauley L.S. MooneySusan Nystoriak Kate Sheeran Swed R.B. Stewart
author: Sarah Kettles
